channel.title: Comments for page "Ninja Beach"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ninja Beach"

item.title: reply
item.content:encoded:
You'll get 65 stamina if you do a vacation at day 13. However you'll get 111 stamina at day 14, after day 14 the amount of stamina won't increase further.

* You can get a max of 111 Stamina after 14 days.
* Until that point is reached you get 5 stamina for each day it passed since you last took a vacation.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So, wait, does that mean the first day after you take a vacation, you get 5 stamina, 10 stamina the next, etc, or is it that each time you take a vacation, you get a bunch of stamina, based on when you last took one? If the latter, then how do they get 114 stamina for 14 days? That's only 70â€¦
